#summary Key improvements to SkyControl during the alpha test phase.
#labels SkyControl

Key improvements made to !SkyControl during the alpha test phase (November 2013-January 2014):
  # moved to (this) Google Code project
  # source code re-licensed under a New BSD license
  # star motion and lunar rotation now fully functional
  # flatten cloud layers to foreshorten clouds near the horizon
  # depress cloud layers to hide their edges
  # new and improved image maps
  # five lunar phases and up to six cloud layers
  # re-sizable moon
  # specify a day of the year
  # shadow filters and simple water processors.
